"show_minor_x_labels": true, "show_minor_y_labels": true, "show_only_major_dots": false, "show_x_guides": false, "show_x_labels": true, "show_y_guides": false, "show_y_labels": true, "spacing": 10, "stack_from_top": false, "strict": false, "stroke": true, "stroke_style": null, "style": {"background": "#f8f8f8", "ci_colors": [], "colors": ["#333366", "#3c3c79", "#46468c", "#4f4f9f", "#5d5dae", g.title: McKinsey to pay $573M to settle claims over opioid crisis role: source
Newly Active 250Tbps Subsea Cable – The Google Cloud Dunant Cable
Help users in Iran reconnect to Signal
Peter Naur's view of programming
Localize your cat at home with BLE beacon, ESP32s, and Machine Learning
Stepping Down as CEO of the Wikimedia Foundation
An open-source AirPlay mirroring server for the Raspberry Pi
Datatype99: C99 with Sum Types, v0.1.0
Native Mac APIs for Go
Waiting for PostgreSQL 14 – SEARCH and CYCLE clauses
Rust-Analyzer Architecture
Desirable Streets – where do people prefer to walk?
Want to Get Out Alive? Follow the Ants
A better way to build ML: Why you should be using Active Learning
Godot Shaders: View and Share Shaders for Godot
Where's the fastest place to put my server? How much does it matter?
Launch HN: Tint (YC W21) – Embed insurance into any product
Weave.jl – Scientific Reports Using Julia
Powerpaste, the hydrogen technology for small vehicles
How the Brain Responds to Beauty
Launch HN: Feroot (YC W21) – security scanner for front-end JavaScript code
Machine Learning, Kolmogorov Complexity, and Squishy Bunnies (2019)
Collection of Human Interface and Software Design Guides
Why Security Defects Go Unnoticed During Code Reviews? [pdf]
Stacker (YC S20) lets anyone transform spreadsheets and databases into web apps
Drogue Device – An async, no-alloc actor framework for embedded devices
PocketSuite (YC W16) Is Hiring Our Fourth Lead Engineer (Remote)
Enzyme – High-performance automatic differentiation of LLVM
2020 at OCamlPro
